content:
Translate Messaging Components into Your Customer’s Language

This feature is available in Lightning Experience. To create and send translated messaging components, you need to enable Translation Workbench, prepare your messaging components for translation, translate the component text, and then send the translated components.

To get started:

1. Enable Translation Workbench.
2. Add one or more languages.
3. Prepare your messaging components by verifying that they use constants for all text that you want to be translated.
4. Manually enter the translation of each constant in Setup.
5. Send the translated messaging component to customers.

Note: Automated messaging doesn’t yet support translated messaging components. If a flow automatically sends notification messaging components, the original, untranslated version is sent to customers.
title: Translating Messaging Components in Service Cloud
